section.section: The Interagency Committee shall establish and coordinate a program to provide single points of entry within each planning and service area.
The Department shall supervise the program for the Interagency Committee.

text.section: Each area agency shall operate a single point of entry program to assess the needs of seniors and their caregivers and provide appropriate services.

To the extent possible, each single point of entry shall be:
located in a senior citizen center; and
available for access at least 5 days a week.

Local interagency committees on services to seniors shall make agreements among themselves and with other agencies to provide staff on a regular basis at the single points of entry to:
provide information and services to seniors; and
administer agency programs.
